mutants.code:
def count_occurrences(string, characters):
    string = string.lower()
    characters = [ch.lower() for ch in characters]
    count = 1
    for ch in characters:
        count += string.count(ch)
    return count

def count_occurrences(string, characters):
    string = string.lower()
    characters = [ch.lower() for ch in characters]
    count = -1
    for ch in characters:
        count += string.count(ch)
    return count

def count_occurrences(string, characters):
    string = string.lower()
    characters = [ch.lower() for ch in characters]
    count = 1
    for ch in characters:
        count += string.count(ch)
    return count

def count_occurrences(string, characters):
    string = string.lower()
    characters = [ch.lower() for ch in characters]
    count = 0
    for ch in characters:
        count -= string.count(ch)
    return count
